> <OLD>
>
> All the noyses and contmotions started to made Nightlight react, but still
> she wasnt fully awake.

<NEW>

In her semiconscious state NIGHTLIGHT could hear what sounded like
RODIMUS! Although his voice sounded different, it was still
unmistakably that of her Husband.

"Rest, sleep my love, I will never let you come to harm again." He
said to her tenderly.

And then there was the sound of movement and then sensation of wind
and then heat and then NIGHTLIGHT's world shook!!!

. . . .
